rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with traditional Kerala-style woodwork and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Centrally located living area with large floor-to-ceiling windows and adjoining verandas. Designed for gatherings following Vastu principles by aligning seating areas to the northeast.
Adjacent to the kitchen with ample lighting; incorporates traditional Kerala motifs and ensures a harmonious flow of energy as per Vastu.
Traditional Kerala-style kitchen with open space and modern amenities. Windows designed for optimal lighting while adhering to local building norms.
Spacious master bedroom on the ground floor with a balcony overlooking the garden. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide ample natural light and ventilation.
Guest room featuring traditional Kerala design elements; window placements follow Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
Well-equipped master bathroom with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, designed with Vastu in mind.

openings.description: Large door with traditional Kerala wooden carvings ensuring security and aesthetic appeal.
Floor-to-ceiling French doors connecting the living room to the veranda, enhancing natural light and ventilation.
Large balcony window offering a panoramic view of the garden and pool area.

rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom with traditional Kerala style decor and Vastu-aligned window placements for positive energy.
Guest or family room designed in a minimalist traditional Kerala style, ensuring ample ventilation.

Functional bathroom for the upper level; includes traditional Kerala fixtures with efficient water usage.
